articles.title: On CCTV, "KGF"-Inspired Teen Serial Killer Seen With Victim. He Killed 5
articles.description: An alleged serial killer in Madhya Pradesh believed to have murdered four security guards in their sleep has been caught on CCTV attacking one of his victims.
articles.content:
Shiv Prasad killed three security guards in three nights in Sagar and one more in Bhopal.

articles.title: The Fighter Jet For India's Newest Aircraft Carrier INS Vikrant: 5 Facts
articles.description: India got its newest aircraft carrier today. The largest ship ever made in India, INS Vikrant's main arsenal will be the Russian-origin MiG-29K, a naval version of the MiG-29 jet that has been serving with the Indian Air Force for decades.
articles.content:
• The MiG-29K is an all-weather fighter with a maximum speed over twice the speed of sound.
